verses.verse: וַתָּ֣שַׁר <WH7891> vat-Ta-shar Then sang דְּבוֹרָ֔ה <WH1683> de-vo-Rah, Deborah וּבָרָ֖ק <WH1301> u-va-Rak and Barak בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son אֲבִינֹ֑עַם <WH42> 'a-vi-No-'am; of Abinoam בַּיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> bai-Yom on that day הַה֖וּא <WH1931> ha-Hu he לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> le-Mor. saying

בִּפְרֹ֤עַ <WH6544> bif-Ro-a' led פְּרָעוֹת֙ <WH6546> pe-ra-'Ot the leaders בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> be-Yis-ra-'El, of Israel בְּהִתְנַדֵּ֖ב <WH5068> be-hit-nad-Dev willingly offered עָ֑ם <WH5971> 'Am; when the people בָּרֲכ֖וּ <WH1288> ba-ra-Chu Praise יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. ye the LORD

שִׁמְע֣וּ <WH8085> shim-'U Hear מְלָכִ֔ים <WH4428> me-la-Chim, O ye kings הַאֲזִ֖ינוּ <WH238> ha-'a-Zi-nu give ear רֹֽזְנִ֑ים <WH7336> ro-ze-Nim; O ye princes אָֽנֹכִ֗י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi, I לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> Yah-weh unto the LORD אָנֹכִ֣י <WH595> 'a-no-Chi I אָשִׁ֔ירָה <WH7891> 'a-Shi-rah, I [even] I will sing אֲזַמֵּ֕ר <WH2167> 'a-zam-Mer I will sing לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh [praise] to the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

הָרִ֥ים <WH2022> ha-Rim The mountains נָזְל֖וּ <WH5140> na-ze-Lu melted מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD זֶ֣ה <WH2088> zeh This סִינַ֔י <WH5514> si-Nai, [even] that Sinai מִפְּנֵ֕י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei from before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֥י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

בִּימֵ֞י <WH3117> bi-Mei In the days שַׁמְגַּ֤ר <WH8044> sham-Gar of Shamgar בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son עֲנָת֙ <WH6067> 'a-Nat of Anath בִּימֵ֣י <WH3117> bi-Mei in the days יָעֵ֔ל <WH3278> ya-'El, of Jael חָדְל֖וּ <WH2308> cha-de-Lu were unoccupied אֳרָח֑וֹת <WH734> o-ra-Chot; the highways וְהֹלְכֵ֣י <WH1980> ve-ho-le-Chei and the travellers נְתִיב֔וֹת <WH5410> ne-ti-Vot, path יֵלְכ֕וּ <WH1980> ye-le-Chu went אֳרָח֖וֹת <WH734> o-ra-Chot ways עֲקַלְקַלּֽוֹת׃ <WH6128> a-kal-kal-Lot. roundabout
